name: Light at the Museum
description:
Controls
Move: Arrow keys / WASD
Interact: E / X
Place item: Q / Z
Respawn at checkpoint if you get stuck or something: R

–--------------------------

When the Curator asked Clara to retrieve the Unholy Grail from the museum’s Underground Archives, she didn’t think there would be any issue. But, as she ventured deeper and deeper, she began to find that the shadows in the basement may have been more dangerous than she thought…

–--------------------------

Hiya! We’re Team Juicebox and we’re back with yet another game for this holiest of LD anniversaries. The biggest thing that we did differently for this jam was that we tried to coordinate an actual in-person LD! All of our past games were coordinated (mostly) over Discord, so we were hoping an in-person jam would push our collaboration through the roof.

In the end, this didn’t entirely happen as expected given that one of us came down sick, two of us were recruited last minute and were unable to make it to the Home Base, and another two of us were missing for at least a day due to various other last-minute emergency occurrences. Luckily, we had a big enough team that we were still able to create a game! This game is a bit moodier and LOT more puzzle-y than the games we’re used to working on, so while this was some new territory, we hope you still enjoy our game. And hey, feel free to leave a comment to tell us what you think!
